CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT.schema: `ID` STRING KEY, `KSQL_COL_0` ARRAY<STRUCT<`K` STRING, `V` INTEGER>>, `KSQL_COL_1` ARRAY<STRUCT<`K` STRING, `V` BIGINT>>, `KSQL_COL_2` ARRAY<STRUCT<`K` STRING, `V` DOUBLE>>, `KSQL_COL_3` ARRAY<STRUCT<`K` STRING, `V` BOOLEAN>>, `KSQL_COL_4` ARRAY<STRUCT<`K` STRING, `V` STRING>>, `KSQL_COL_5` ARRAY<STRUCT<`K` STRING, `V` STRING>>

testCase.name: entries sorted
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, INTMAP MAP<STRING, INT>, BIGINTMAP MAP<STRING, BIGINT>, DOUBLEMAP MAP<STRING, DOUBLE>, BOOLEANMAP MAP<STRING, BOOLEAN>, STRINGMAP MAP<STRING, STRING>, NULLMAP MAP<STRING, STRING>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, ENTRIES(INTMAP, TRUE), ENTRIES(BIGINTMAP, TRUE), ENTRIES(DOUBLEMAP, TRUE), ENTRIES(BOOLEANMAP, TRUE), ENTRIES(STRINGMAP, TRUE), ENTRIES(NULLMAP, TRUE) FROM TEST;
